tweets.text: The weather forecast is drier for the coming days, however we still have Flood Warnings in place in Yorkshire. Stay vigilant, don't walk or drive through any flood water, and keep up-to-date with your local flood risk: https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb #PrepareActSurvive #floodaware

tweets.text: Many thanks for the #landlord of the #KingsArms in #York to peer from his #window for me to view the rising #floodwater from the #RiverOuse #Yorkshire #Flooding @EnvAgencyNW @yorkshirepost @jonmillsphoto @BenJonesPicEd #friendsintherightplaces #picoftheday #photooftheday #NIKON https://t.co/8FjdOeyD2S

Work to encourage channel avulsion on Swindale beck finally crosses tipping point. Recent floods have started an avulsion creating 5 hectares of anastomosing wetland. Minor intervention and patience have eventually paid off!
@RSPBEngland @EnvAgencyNW @SalfordScience @SalfordHydro https://t.co/biaKE3rFDA
@Feargal_Sharkey @TimesRadio @alexisconran @DefraGovUK @Ofwat @EnvAgency @thameswater @WandleForum Hs2 about to tunnel 16km into The Chilterns https://t.co/gc4Mh3XePB

@Feargal_Sharkey @WandleForum @TimesRadio @alexisconran @DefraGovUK @Ofwat @EnvAgency @thameswater Don't forget to sign up to this to persuade @thameswater  to meet its legal obligations: https://t.co/whvkviOC1p

tweets.text: A nicely captured (zoom!) Boeing 727 of the Oil Spill Response Limited @oilspillexperts. They operate a first-of-a-kind capability for the oil and gas industry deploying dispersants which break down oil slicks into smaller droplets so that they can be more easily biodegraded. ^KF https://t.co/ALEyqMN9Mj

tweets.text: Incredibly excited about launching the @NORA_Europe and @NativeOysterNet joint publication on #oyster restoration #biosecurity at #NORA3 tomorrow! Such a fantastic and knowledgeable authorship team. Thanks to all and to the workshop sponsors @EnvAgency @LIFEprogramme  @EllermanUK https://t.co/93W23EAozD

New data explorer tool available integrating @EnvAgency  and @Earthwatch_Eur volunteer-collected water quality data with @Riverflies data for the Thames.

Thames WaterBlitz overview: https://t.co/VFTIrDK8Jg
Data explorer: https://t.co/HhD2aXFu2i https://t.co/jTvwxRNvkd

Publication of a report we produced for the @EnvAgency to help deliver on the AMR Action Plan 

"Framework for understanding environmental antimicrobial resistance in England" https://t.co/iguV2HJtng https://t.co/Iz9MleX0Nx

1/2 Training tonight for D743 & D785 was upstream of Teddington Lock, with crews having to operate the Lock under the watchful eye of Gemma, the fantastic head lock-keeper @EnvAgency. As the exercise ended, both crews were tasked by @HMCoastguard https://t.co/mUVwPRL9dY

@EnvAgencyMids @AdamBaylissEA during a drawdown around 550 mega litres is released per day, this increases the levels at Chatsworth by about 20cm and is noticable at Matlock. The increase in flow is about 5m3/s

tweets.text: There will be a release of water from Ladybower Reservoir #Derbyshire  tomorrow (Wed) from 8.30am to increase #Flood  storage capacity following recent wet weather. The River Derwent will rise slightly down to Matlock https://t.co/UPv7pgyHHO

The #FieldTeam recently completed maintenance at a #Reservoir on the #RiverDon.

The large structure is the reservoir outlet. We store water, then release it when the peak of the flood has passed to keep #floodrisk minimised.

üíß This one site stores a huge 679 million litres üíß https://t.co/BhLPcCEwAT

Fantastic Panel Discussion The State of English #Rivers @Gw4Water Conference this morning. Thank you to our Panel: Arlin Rickard @theriverstrust @acrharrington of @DwrCymru @alicertchie @CLAtweets Helen Wakeham @EnvAgency Mark Squire @NatResWales and Chair @SteveOrmerod https://t.co/xTcDSvuu1d

A happy announcement - Revitalising Redesdale reached its halfway milestone earlier this year! üëè 

We're really proud of our achievements so far. Thank you to all who have helped along the way!

Read on for the full report... 

https://t.co/rq1wwM1hw3 https://t.co/0Ra8jzUcME

Really pleased to see @NottsCC @viaeastmidlands have contracted in extra support to clear culverts in @LowdhamParish They are clearing essential culverts around A6097 roundabout. Good effort and thank you. Nice surprise!! @EnvAgencyMids @PeterTCross https://t.co/J2T44TsoMa

tweets.text:
Don't underestimate the size of the European waste mafia which ships waste all over the üåé even in lockdown. Nowadays it's trucked out of UK to end up who knows where. 

In 2018/19 @EnvAgency¬†prevented 13,000 tonnes of waste destined for illegal export.

https://t.co/wsChuIjDzP

Although times may be difficult for many businesses at the moment, it is important to bear in mind your #floodrisk and take even simple actions to make yourself more flood resilient, such as by signing up to @EnvAgencyNW free flood alerts and warnings! ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/e13FGpysOu https://t.co/V62iESwdln

@CRTvolunteers @HighwaysSEAST @WalAbbeyNews @murrayscott06 @Habgas @thisisyourriver @EnvAgency Here we go again, fly tipping under the M25 bridge, Waltham Abbey. A bit much for us old pensioners. Do something about it Highways - fence the area off! https://t.co/XTTSLRLY0r

To help the @EnvAgencySE achieve a rapid response which will allow them to trace the pollution while the incident is ongoing, we need you to keep reporting it as soon as you spot the problem. Call 0800 80 70 60 with as many details as possible.
@ianhodgeEA @EnvAgencyYNE *warnings!

tweets.text: @ashsmith43 @Dunne4Ludlow @UnderwaterMedia @EnvAgency Northumbrian Water, Wastewater, Civil and Environmental Engineering.  My whole career in feasibility studies, design, construction, commissioning and operation of wastewater treatment assets.

Resources from our Payment For Outcomes project with @nationaltrust and @yorkshire_dales are now live! Find out more here - https://t.co/nwg6FhyEYW . We integrated #nfm into their PfO trial, and investigated farmers views on how #nfm may work for their businesses.

Scientists are now testing sewage samples to detect local #coronavirus outbreaks, even when people don't show symptoms.

This is a valuable step in supporting NHS Test and Trace.

Find out more: https://t.co/JEJxbk0ofA

#CovidSewageTesting @DHSCgovuk @EnvAgency https://t.co/4xdR82CtJo

tweets.text: @dearhumi_blues @sc_wadsy @StefanMarjoram @EnvAgency @KenGoodwinITV Going to need a bigger tank! - these things spill for months and the tanks are designed for 2 hours so it won't work. Infrastructure failure.
@sc_wadsy @ashsmith43 @StefanMarjoram @EnvAgency @KenGoodwinITV Such a tank should have been made mandatory for all water companies and factories.  Has DEFRA put it in train yet?
